dublin_core.dcvalue: Good prenatal and postnatal care and good preschool education are important approaches to raise the diatheses of population for the chinese nation This article suggests that the cell phone platform can be used to communicate with each other among the hospitals the government and the common people through which the useful informations could be transmitted to the relative persons in time It s also a new way for propaganda of family planning This article introduces the structure of the system the creation of the expert database and the connection to the telecommunication system
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T17:55:49Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2008-06-27
Zhongguo yi liao qi xie za zhi = Chinese journal of medical instrumentation
[Developing a system to promote good prenatal and postnatal care, and good preschool education based on the cellphone platform].
